【懷恨在心】迪路菲奧睇死朗奴高文教唔掂巴塞：佢冇幫過我
https://hk.appledaily.com/sports/20200821/VFFN3YQWRFHPVOIFFYP3JJVE4E/
迪路菲奧（左）坦言對朗奴高文（右）沒有好感
A
A
A
朗奴高文周三落實出任巴塞隆拿新任教練，曾經與他在愛華頓共事的巴塞青訓產品迪路菲奧就大爆兩人昔日的過節，更表示不看好朗奴高文和巴塞短期內有所改變。
現時效力屈福特的迪路菲奧曾經在16/17球季在愛華頓與朗奴高文短暫共事，不過他就對這位球員時代同樣效力過巴塞的「師兄」沒有太好的印象，周四他接受加泰隆尼亞電台訪問時更大爆兩人的恩怨：「作為教練他從來沒有向我提供過任何幫助，我對此很不高興，最後我主動要求外借到AC米蘭，他能否帶領巴塞成功我有所保留。」
巴塞過去一年出現過大大小小的亂況，不過迪路菲奧卻表示對這間母會不再有半點關心，並指球隊問題不在於教練人選：「巴塞現時的狀況與我無關，我一點也不關心。他們有許多像我一樣由拉馬西亞培育出來的球員，他們需要機會學習球隊的風格，但巴塞對這些青訓產品沒有太多耐性，這是他們現在落後於其他球會的原因。」
迪路菲奧2015年被巴塞出售到愛華頓之後，因為在英超有不俗表現而被母會回購，不過他回歸巴塞後未有獲得太多機會，最終僅回歸魯營半季就再次被巴塞放棄。

Dear Everton fans,

I hope you’re doing well.

It seems our paths have crossed again. One of ours is joining you this season. And like so many players before him, he’s been with us since he was just a little boy.

Shortly after his debut, he became one of our best. Especially the last couple of years were amazing. From the Spanish Cup quarter final (no hard feelings) to our Champions League run and winning the La Liga.

The team he was part of showed the world who we are and what Real Madrid stands for.

Like you, we pride ourselves on being one of the best at developing talent and giving young players a shot at the highest level. You could say your new star is the embodiment of that pride.

That’s one of the many reasons we don’t like to see him leave, but we understand it’s time for him to move on. To dream on.

And where better to do so than in your theatre. Trust me, I know.

Please take good care of our James, and help him dream.

Enjoy the future,

病屍麻, 皇迷吹水區

replies.msg:
喺佢成長以嚟都無邊個帶佢
每季換兩個教練，唔同教練風格同想法都唔同，一時叫佢試打攻中，一時又叫佢打box to box，有時又叫佢打工兵防中，有時又叫佢打墮後防中
本身佢打得最好嘅時候就係隔離有巴里同麥卡菲，有兩個人帶住佢踢，踢得好地地又突然鳩文玩三攻中，到大SAM又叫佢打工兵防中，到施華又話佢係打攻中
咁嘅成長環境美斯都變連加特啦，完全無一個穩定位置俾佢去踢，身邊帶佢嘅人又係唔穩定年年唔同樣，一個年青球員最需要就係一個mentor去帶嚟踢，本身最好就係月巴去帶，但仆街施華又清鳩走月巴
同埋一班勝利球迷又係仆街冚家鏟，明明成隊波都閪，佢哋就將所有責任放落去TOM度，表現差啲就無限放大，踢得好又當無事發生，大佬仲邊有信心踢落去啊乜柒都屌，TOM一返到去幼獅無晒呢啲壓力去踢，即刻好表現勁多。

The Times now report that while Ancelotti wants sign Tomori this summer, the main emphasis is on offloading players. It's claimed that the 'bulk' of those who did not start Everton's first Premier League game of the 2020/21 season against Tottenham will be allowed to depart this summer if the right offers are made.

This includes the likes of Sigurdsson and Walcott, while the futures of Iwobi, Bernard, Fabian Delph and Cenk Tosun are also described as 'uncertain'. In addition, Yannick Bolasie, Muhamed Besic and Sandro Ramírez are not considered part of Ancelotti's plans.


Meanwhile, the likes of Walcott, Besic, Ramirez and Bolasie all have contracts set to expire next summer and Everton may struggle to recoup significant transfer fees for the out-of-favour stars.

One player Ancelotti is looking to keep hold of is young Moise Kean. The striker struggled to settle during his first season in the Premier League and has been linked with a return to Juventus on loan, but the boss is keen for him to stay put. But their stance on his future 'could be tested' should an interested party make a genuine move for him.

Meanwhile, the likes of Walcott, Besic, Ramirez and Bolasie all have contracts set to expire next summer and Everton may struggle to recoup significant transfer fees for the out-of-favour stars.

One player Ancelotti is looking to keep hold of is young Moise Kean. The striker struggled to settle during his first season in the Premier League and has been linked with a return to Juventus on loan, but the boss is keen for him to stay put. But their stance on his future 'could be tested' should an interested party make a genuine move for him.
